type: Request for Standing Offer - Heavy Equipment Rental
procurement_category: Goods and Services for Government Departments
short_summary: The Government of Canada is seeking Standing Offers from qualified bidders to provide Heavy Equipment Rentals.
description: The government is seeking Standing Offers from qualified bidders to provide Heavy Equipment Rentals for a period of 1 year with 2 option periods, as required by the Department of National Defence. The rentals will cover a variety of equipment such as cranes, excavators and other construction machinery.
full_summary:
### Title
W0127-22P030 - Heavy Equipment Rentals

#### Tender Details
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4104572438
* **Reference Number**: WS4104572438-Document 4104772342
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Publication Date**: July 24, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 11, 2023, 14:00 EDT
* **Amendment Date**: July 26, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: August 31, 2024
* **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Procurement Information
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Contract Details
* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entities**: The Department of National Defence (DND)
* **End User Entities Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Trade Agreements
The Government of Canada seeks participation in this procurement opportunity from businesses that have been qualified for contract awards. The solicitation will be open to bidders that have completed any of the agreements listed below:

* The World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Contact Information
* **Contract Contact Name**: Matthew Keenan
* **Contract Contact Email Address**: [matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](
